thread.section_title: Hotel Nord et Champagne - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Disappointing stay
thread.title_full: Disappointing stay - Review of Hotel Nord et Champagne, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: MorenetaMK
title: Disappointing stay
text: Amongst other issues, rooms were not as clean as expected. The night concierge was unfriendly. Whilst the breakfast staff were friendly, and food was served to the table, poor variety in what was available meant I could only have a satsuma and coffee for breakfast - does not cater well for allergy sufferers at all.
